name: Brute
description: Brute is a challenging arcade shooter with a vibrant, minimalist aesthetic. It's a game about planning, timing and discovery featuring an atmospheric soundtrack and sounds made from analog synthesizers.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: x64 dual core processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: A nVidia or AMD graphics card with latest drivers. We recommend you avoid any hardware using Intel graphics chips due to their poor performance, stability, and feature set. Storage: 240 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
